item.description:
Lots of people signed up, and the library is open, so we're definitely meeting!
If there is something you'd like to practice, please bring it, or suggest an activity.
If you arrive before 6:30 and don't see anyone else, please tell the Information Desk that you are there for the Meetup and where you are sitting. Please choose a table and welcome everyone as we arrive!
If everyone prefers, we can meet for one hour and then go get supper somewhere.
Happy holidays!

---------
We usually meet at 6:30p, in the BPL, at the tables to the left of the information booth in the middle of the new building (Boylston Street) lobby. We may not have a sign so please look for people seated at the tables near the entrance. If you get there first, smile so we can find you!
---------
We'll meet this month from 6:30p to 8p to practice speaking English. Maybe we'll go to supper afterwards at a nearby restaurant.

Bring your grammar questions, or any books you think are helpful. We'll start with introductions or an icebreaker...activity to be decided later.

Hope you can join us, see you there!

Reece

The group will meet on the first floor of the Library, in the large reading room to the left of the Information Desk. We usually sit at one of the tables near the entrance, on the left.
If you don't find the group, you can ask the Information Desk for the 6:30p Meetup Group for English Conversation. It is NOT a regular BPL English group!
Have fun!

For more information, see http://www.bpl.org...

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: Thurs 12/28 Boston ESoL December Meetup
